title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, December 8, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of English physician Doris Bell Collier (1897), who also wrote mystery novels, short stories, and radio plays under the pseudonym Josephine Bell.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of English physician Doris Bell Collier (1897), who also wrote mystery novels, short stories, and radio plays under the pseudonym Josephine Bell.
